name: Attack Of The Luck Leeches!
description:
Greetings Cosmonaut!

This is your corporate overlords. An alien race deemed "The Luck Leeches" has declared war on our humble casino. They have robbed us of our magic dice and fled into the Asteroid Belt!

DESTROY THEM!!!!

If you encounter any of our dice, don't be shy to collect them! Use the resources carefully, and depending on how you roll, you can --

1 - Help You Evade

2 - Stop Your Ship For Repairs

3 - Damage Everything

4 - Harvest New Dice

5 - Give Your HP A Boost

6 - Jackpot!

--

Get out there and catch as many of those Leeches as you can!

Best Regards,

Corporate

~~

Developers

-C0dyy / Game Development-Game Design

-PixlWyrm / Art

-Sunnydeer / Music-SFX

-Coleknz / Design-Game Design
